Articles.Content: I want to see someone build a ship big enough to escape jools atmosphere from the ground yet small enoghf to survive the pressure! or just build a base on jool with at least 5 buildings!

Sorry, Jool is a gas giant, and can't be landed on.

Imposible chalanges are closed.
